bio_text_1: I'm a Full Stack Developer specializing in building scalable web applications and cloud-native solutions. My work spans enterprise platforms, IoT systems, and high-performance websites... with a product-first mindset that prioritizes business outcomes. I've delivered production planning and supply chain features for brewery management software using Angular and .NET on Azure, built real-time IoT data pipelines processing sensor telemetry, and developed responsive client websites optimized for performance and SEO. I'm most effective when collaborating with cross-functional teams to break down complex business problems into well-architected, maintainable software. Whether it's designing cloud infrastructure, building interactive frontends, or integrating third-party systems, I focus on delivering solutions that create real value.
bio_text_2: ; I'm always up for a chat!
tech_experience_text: I have a wide range of experience with different technologies. Most of my experience is in the JavaScript and .NET Core ecosystems. I also have experience within DevOps more specifically in the Azure ecosystem. I adapt quickly to the technology stack required for a project and don't limit myself to my current domain of experience.
tech_experience_click_hint: Try clicking on a skill to view projects where I have used it
projects_by_tech_text: I don't find skill levels particularly measurable, but I want to provide context into where I've used different technologies. My proficiency is based on real project experience.
cta_content: Every project I take on I take ownership of.
